# NVRAM file for BCM943341WBFGN_3 iTR board for bcm43341wlbga chip

manfid=0x2d0
prodid=0x0653
vendid=0x14e4
devid=0x4386
boardtype=0x066d
boardrev=0x1303
boardnum=22
#macaddr=00:90:4c:c5:12:38
macaddr=00:90:4c:43:34:18
#sromrev=3
#boardflags: 
# bit 19 3tswitch:   2.4GHz FEM: SP3T switch share with BT
# bit 16	 nopa:   no external pa
#            keep original 0x200
boardflags=0x0090201
xtalfreq=37400
nocrc=1
ag0=255
aa2g=1
ccode=ALL
pa0itssit=0x20
#PA parameters for 2.4GHz
pa0b0=6747
pa0b1=-808
pa0b2=-178
tssifloor2g=69
# rssi params for 2.4GHz
rssismf2g=0xf
rssismc2g=0x8
rssisav2g=0x1
cckPwrOffset=3
# rssi params for 5GHz
rssismf5g=0xf
rssismc5g=0x7
rssisav5g=0x3
#PA parameters for lower a-band
pa1lob0=5370
pa1lob1=-669
pa1lob2=-194
tssifloor5gl=44
#PA parameters for midband
pa1b0=5174
pa1b1=-646
pa1b2=-192
tssifloor5gm=29
#PA paramasdeters for high band
pa1hib0=5060
pa1hib1=-635
pa1hib2=-191
tssifloor5gh=28
rxpo5g=0

#Per rate power back-offs for g band, in .5 dB steps. Set it once you have the right numbers.
maxp2ga0=0x48
#cck2gpo=0x1000
ofdm2gpo=0x22221111
mcs2gpo0=0x1111
mcs2gpo1=0x4444

#Per rate power back-offs for a band, in .5 dB steps. Set it once you have the right numbers.
maxp5gla0=0x44
ofdm5glpo=0x88886664
mcs5glpo0=0x4444
mcs5glpo1=0xa888
mcs5glpo2=0xaaaa

maxp5ga0=0x44
ofdm5gpo=0x88886664
mcs5gpo0=0x4444
mcs5gpo1=0xaaaa
mcs5gpo2=0xaaaa

maxp5gha0=0x44
ofdm5ghpo=0x88886664
mcs5ghpo0=0x4444
mcs5ghpo1=0xaaaa
mcs5ghpo2=0xaaaa

# RF SW Truth Table: ctrl0 for BT_TX; ctrl1 or 5G Tx; ctrl2 for 5G Rx; Ctrl3 for 2G Tx; Ctrl4 for 2G Rx
swctrlmap_2g=0x00080008,0x00100010,0x00080008,0x011010,0x11f
swctrlmap_5g=0x00020002,0x00040004,0x00020002,0x011010,0x2fe
gain=32
triso2g=8
triso5g=8

# Parameters for DAC2x mode and ALPF bypass
txalpfbyp=1
txalpfpu=1
dacrate2xen=1

#tx parameters
loflag=0
iqlocalidx5g=40
dlocalidx5g=70
iqcalidx5g=50
lpbckmode5g=1 
txiqlopapu5g=0
txiqlopapu2g=0
dlorange_lowlimit=5
papden2g=1
papden5g=1
cckpapden=0

#rx parameters
gain_settle_dly_2g=4
gain_settle_dly_5g=4
noise_cal_po_2g=-1
noise_cal_po_40_2g=-1
noise_cal_high_gain_2g=73
noise_cal_nf_substract_val_2g=346
noise_cal_po_5g=-1
noise_cal_po_40_5g=-1
noise_cal_high_gain_5g=73
noise_cal_nf_substract_val_5g=346

#Set for SW OOB using GPIO 4
muxenab=0x2
sd_gpout=4
sd_gpval=1
sd_oobonly=1
sd_level_trigger=1
